# `.github/instructions/README.md`

Each `*.instructions.md` file in the `.github/instructions/` directory is intended to provide instructions for Copilot that `applyTo` specific files in the repository.

Multiple `*.instructions.md` files are used in alignment with [GitHub documentation for using one or more instructions.md files](https://docs.github.com/en/copilot/how-tos/configure-custom-instructions/add-repository-instructions?tool=vscode#using-one-or-more-instructionsmd-files).
